bool GrLightSet::RemoveLight ( GrLight *  light  ) 

try to remove the light.

simply return false if we couldn't find the light.

ensure that the pointers are the same. If the light manager is used, then it should be impossible for lights to have the same name since they're prefixed with scene and model information.

remove the light and return true.
